description.value:
Your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Feint]{Feints} are far more distracting than normal, drawing your foes' attention and allowing you and your allies to take greater advantage.

While a creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} by your Feint, it also takes a -2 circumstance penalty to Perception checks and Reflex saves.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Effect: Distracting Feint]{Effect: Distracting Feint}
